item.title: Lanceur d‘alerte demande au F.B.I. s‘ils ont reçu et conservé les e-mails envoyés en 2015 et s‘ils ont lancé une enquête pénale contre McDonald's Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald’s Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

Expéditeur : [Whistle-blower’s email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

Destinataire : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

Destinataire : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?
